thread.title: Pier420 Introduces its Latest 3-in-1 Vaporizer Starter – Ago G5 Triple
thread.title_full: Pier420 Introduces its Latest 3-in-1 Vaporizer Starter – Ago G5 Triple

author: prbuzz.com
title: Pier420 Introduces its Latest 3-in-1 Vaporizer Starter – Ago G5 Triple
text:
The government in various nations is starting to consider the use of vaporizer as a better alternative than smoking tobacco and cigarettes which could be the key for smokers to quit smoking. This is because most of the oils, wax, and essence that were put in vaporizers bear the lowest concentration of chemicals that is usually ingested in tobacco and cigarettes in high concentration causing the smokers to be addicted to it. Many health experts see that through vaporizers, it could help people who wanted to quit smoking but do not know where to start, be a nonsmoking person. And since many are eager to quit smoking and now have switched to vaping, Pier420 took this chance to introduce their latest 3-in-1 vaporizer starter, which is the Ago G5 Triple.
The Ago G5 Triple, unlike any other vaporizer, is an all-in-one vaporizer pen that allows people to vaporize dry herbs, wax oils or concentrates. It has an LCD display indicator, interchangeable attachments and a sleek design that can be bought at a very affordable price.
This Ago G5 Triple has the ability to vaporize the contents under 5 seconds, which make it the fastest heating vape on the market today. But getting addicted to this vaporizer is zero to negative chance because there is an indicator that tells the user how much they have vaped. Its heating power came from the internal lithium ion battery so users are guaranteed that they can get the vaping quality that they desire.
The Ago G5 triple comes in high quality packaging, where the premium Ago H2 liquid tanks for the eJuice and liquid that will allow the vaporizer to use the herbal, the wax vaporizer , and the e-cigarette in one setup are also included. Aside from this, what can also be found in the kit are the 3-high performance attachments such as herbal ceramic lined herbal chamber, a glass globe wax attachment and the interchangeable specialty globe coils.
Upon receiving the Ago G5, users are advised to charge it for 6 hours before using it for the first time. By doing this, it helps in conditioning the battery and prolongs the durability of the vaporizer. After the first 6 hours charge, it can now be charge next time within 2 hours. The method of charging the vaporizer can be by plugging it to the outlet or to electronic devices like laptop, tablet or power banks.
To see more of the advanced vaporizers today, visit www.pier420.com
